title: Star Wars: The Dark Rival
description: Qui-Gon Jinn's past is not at rest. How can he forge a bond with young Obi-Wan Kenobi while he is haunted by the betrayal of his first apprenticeâ€”Xanatos? Xanatos was also a promising student . . . until the dark side of the Force intervened. Qui-Gon thought he was gone forever.But now Xanatos is back. And he wants revenge.
author: Jude Watson
